titles.title: A resolution designating March 2022 as "World Down Syndrome Month" and supporting the goals and ideals of World Down Syndrome Month.
A resolution designating March 2022 as "World Down Syndrome Month" and supporting the goals and ideals of World Down Syndrome Month.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates March 2022 as World Down Syndrome Month.
